>@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.wq8dRJYQ58VZQuZU]{First Vanguard Aspect}

You embody energy states that are preserved in ongoing motion, isolated from entropy

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.Dpn0NvVBkDNlp45B]{Momentum Insight (Ex)} You gain Improved Combat Maneuver (bull rush) as a bonus feat and a +2 insight bonus to Culture checks.

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.TBMx5RtvuycSu9LP]{Momentum Embodiment (Ex)} Once per combat, when you move a distance greater than your normal speed in one turn (using multiple move actions, the run full action, or a bonus to speed that allows you to move beyond your normal maximum), you can gain 1 Entropy Point without taking any additional action.

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.7RzvMl0JCvMgIIB6]{Momentum Catalyst (Su)} Creatures you select in a 60-foot radius are pushed away from you. A targeted creature moves 30 feet directly away from you but can attempt a Fortitude saving throw to halve the distance.

Improved: Targeted creatures that fail their Fortitude saves are also knocked @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.XeRGqHVtcZ7vsgJ0]{Prone} and take 1d6 bludgeoning damage per 2 vanguard levels you have.

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.Z2SEyjvIDy6CMCKn]{Momentum Finale (Sp)} You can cast telekinetic projectile at will as a spell-like ability. Rather than dealing the spellâ€™s normal damage, both the target and the projectile take damage as if you hit them with your entropic strike. Additionally, you can spend 2 Entropy Points to cast telekinesis as a spell-like ability, but only using its combat maneuver option.
